body:
I'm having some issues with images showing up on my profile. I believe I'm suing the right HTML coding (<img src="insert.real.ip">) (without the brackets of course). One pic is showing but the rest aren't.

I need some help with this, thanks.
body_tagged:
I'm having some issues with images showing up on my profile. I believe I'm suing the right HTML coding (<img src="insert.real.ip">) (without the brackets of course). One pic is showing but the rest aren't.

I need some help with this, thanks.
title: TECH HELP: Images on Profile

replies.body:
linktophoto.png
If you don't have PNG at the end of each photo link, that's your problem.
replies.body_tagged:
linktophoto.png
If you don't have PNG at the end of each photo link, that's your problem.

replies.body: That fixed it, Thanks! you can check out my new profile at: http://avicus.net/ShadowSlayerZ7?tab=about

replies.body: I forgot to blur out. But lots of other players have them up. Princezz_Dubstep also has hackusations on her profile, but does that make her immature? No, it doesn't. Honestly, that was kinda low tbh. Does it change me as a person? No it doesn't. I can take them down for now and thanks for reminding me but did you really have to make it that? Also it sounds like you're trying to act like your better than me tbh when you say that. If I'm immature, then you're disrespectful by adding a rude part like that.

replies.body:
No-one should have hackusations on their profile regardless if they're a moderator or a player.

You are publicly harassing other players.

I didn't call you immature, I do not know you and therefore have no rights to call you anything.
I said that your display of hackusations is immature.

I am not above anyone else. Nor has that ever been my intention.

But by posting hackusations on your profile, you are ironically putting yourself above those that didn't know how to use /report properly by publicly shaming them for hundreds of people to see.

Just because I have an assertive manner at times does not mean I am disrespectful or think that I am above everyone else.

Just because I have an assertive manner at times does not mean I am disrespectful or think that I am above everyone else.

replies.body:
If you want to put a link into and image:

<a href="[Link]"><img src="[Image link]" /></a>
replies.body_tagged:
If you want to put a link into and image:

<a href="[Link]"><img src="[Image link]" /></a>

replies.body:
I blurred mine out so their names aren't showing. Even if they reported.

As long as you have their names blurred out, or they are okay with you having them up there, it should be fine to have :)

replies.body: What you said basically implies I'm immature. The comment sounded like you put yourself higher than others. "Your display of hackusations towards you is quite immature.". Yeah, that's kinda calling me immature you making yourself sound like and adult and me a little kid. That does make you sound better than me, no? Don't scold me like I'm two. It sounds overbearing and to be blunt, douchey. If you didn't mean so, then maybe next time check your wording before possibly offending someone. Call me what you want, but I'm looking out for the people who care more about what other people say.

replies.body:
As stated before, I have never placed myself above anyone else and never will.

Posting hackusations on your profile without blurring the names is quite immature because you are publicly shaming others without their permission so you can feel good about yourself.

Correct me if I'm wrong, but by doing this you are placing yourself above others.
Which is the one thing you are accusing me of doing.

As stated before, I am not calling you immature. I am saying that your display of hackusations is immature.

I did not call you as a person immature.
I called your act of publicising hackusations on your profile immature.

When it comes to the rules, I am assertive when I call out people that breach them.

It is not a personal attack on you, rather, a reminder that something you are doing may cause you to obtain an infraction which I do not want to see.

I am not scolding you. 
I am trying to prevent you getting an infraction from something you may not have known you were doing wrong.

I am not trying to be mean to you.
I am trying to help you.
